List.Item:
OK, here is where you can: 

1) Backup or Restore dashboards. 
2) Move your dashboard location. 
3) Restore to a stock UnleashX.
Ok, here is where you can backup or restore a backup of your dashboard.

Item.arg2: Backup your C:\XBMC. \n\nAre you sure you want this, if there is a previous backup it will be overwritten.
Backup your E:\XBMC. \n\nAre you sure you want this, if there is a previous backup it will be overwritten.
Backup your F:\XBMC. \n\nAre you sure you want this, if there is a previous backup it will be overwritten.
Backup your C:\Dashboard. \n\nAre you sure you want this, if there is a previous backup it will be overwritten.
Backup your E:\Dashboard. \n\nAre you sure you want this, if there is a previous backup it will be overwritten.
Backup your F:\Dashboard. \n\nAre you sure you want this, if there is a previous backup it will be overwritten.
Backup your C:\Dash. \n\nAre you sure you want this, if there is a previous backup it will be overwritten.
Backup your E:\Dash. \n\nAre you sure you want this, if there is a previous backup it will be overwritten.
Backup your F:\Dash. \n\nAre you sure you want this, if there is a previous backup it will be overwritten.
Restore your backup of C:\XBMC. \n\nAre you sure you want this, if there is a dashboard in C:\XBMC\ it will be overwritten.
Restore your backup of E:\XBMC. \n\nAre you sure you want this, if there is a dashboard in E:\XBMC\ it will be overwritten.
Restore your backup of F:\XBMC. \n\nAre you sure you want this, if there is a dashboard in F:\XBMC\ it will be overwritten.
Restore your backup of C:\Dashboard. \n\nAre you sure you want this, if there is a dashboard in C:\Dashboard\ it will be overwritten.
Restore your backup of E:\Dashboard. \n\nAre you sure you want this, if there is a dashboard in E:\Dashboard\ it will be overwritten.
Restore your backup of F:\Dashboard. \n\nAre you sure you want this, if there is a dashboard in F:\Dashboard\ it will be overwritten.
Restore your backup of C:\Dash. \n\nAre you sure you want this, if there is a dashboard in C:\Dash\ it will be overwritten.
Restore your backup of E:\Dash. \n\nAre you sure you want this, if there is a dashboard in E:\Dash\ it will be overwritten.
Restore your backup of F:\Dash. \n\nAre you sure you want this, if there is a dashboard in F:\Dash\ it will be overwritten.

List.Item: In this menu you will be able to move your dashboard location to two different locations.
About to check the path, to make sure a dashboard resides there.

Item.arg2:
Move your dashboard from 

C:\Dashboard\ 
to 
E:\Dashboard\ 

Are you sure you want this, if there is a Dashboard in E:\Dashboard\ it will be overwritten.

Move your dashboard from 

C:\Dashboard\ 
to 
C:\Dash\ 

Are you sure you want this, if there is a Dashboard in C:\Dash\ it will be overwritten.

Move your dashboard from 

C:\Dashboard\ 
to 
E:\Dash\ 

Are you sure you want this, if there is a Dashboard in E:\Dash\ it will be overwritten.

List.Item: About to check the path, to make sure a dashboard resides there.

to

Move your dashboard from

List.Item: In this menu you can restore/revert to a clean UnleashX dashboard.

Item.arg2:
Restore your C:\Dashboard to its default state. 
This is a clean install of UnleashX. 

Are you sure you want this, if there is a dashboard in E:\Dashboard\ and C:\Dashboard\ they will be removed overwritten.

Restore your E:\Dashboard to its default state. 
This is a clean install of UnleashX. 

Are you sure you want this, if there is a dashboard in C:\Dashboard\ and E:\Dashboard\ they will be removed overwritten.
